class.name: gd.app.model.Constraint
class.subselect: SELECT c.constraint_name as name, c.table_name as table, c.constraint_type as type, cu.column_name as column, rc.unique_constraint_name as references FROM information_schema.table_constraints c INNER JOIN information_schema.constraint_column_usage cu ON (c.constraint_name = cu.constraint_name) LEFT OUTER JOIN information_schema.referential_constraints rc ON (c.constraint_name = rc.constraint_name) WHERE c.constraint_schema='public'
